description: Exponent of 8 (value of j) in n-th number of form 3^i*8^j.
links: Sean A. Irvine, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000

OEIS server, Scatterplot of n, a(n) with n=1..10^6.
prog: (PARI) A025672(n)=valuation(A025615(n),8)  \\ - M. F. Hasler, Feb 20 2012(PARI) for(n=1,1e9,n==8^valuation(n,8)*3^valuation(n,3)&print1(valuation(n,8)","))  \\ - M. F. Hasler, Feb 20 2012
